order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT * FROM T_PRODUCT_INFO WHERE FID = #{0} FOR UPDATE

select A.ID, A.FID, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.PRODUCT_DESC, A.PRODUCT_PROTOCAL_ID, A.PRODUCT_INTEREST_WAY_ID, A.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, A.REPAYMENT_WAY, A.IS_FLOW, A.FIX_RATE, A.FLOW_MIN_RATE, A.FLOW_MAX_RATE, A.FLOW_FINAL_RATE, A.DEAD_LINE_TYPE, A.DEAD_LINE_VALUE, A.IS_COLLECT, A.COLLECT_BEGIN_TIME, A.COLLECT_END_TIME, A.COLLECT_FINISH_TIME, A.INTEREST_WAY, A.VALID_BEGIN_DATE, A.VALID_END_DATE, A.BUY_MIN_MONEY, A.BUY_MAX_MONEY, A.BUY_TOTAL_MONEY, A.BUY_TOTAL_PEOPLE, A.BUYED_TOTAL_MONEY, A.BUYED_TOTAL_PEOPLE, A.IS_SHOW, A.SHOW_INDEX, A.TENDER_WAY, A.IS_REDEMPTION, A.SOURCE_WAY, A.MONEY_TYPE, A.RISK_CONTROL_TYPE, A.RISK_LEVEL, A.FLOW_LEVEL, A.PRODUCT_MANAGE_WAY, A.CREATER, A.CREATE_TIME, A.UPDATER, A.UPDATE_TIME, A.STATUS, A.REMARK FROM t_product_info A left join t_product_type D on A.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID=D.ID WHERE 1=1 and (A.VALID_BEGIN_DATE is null and A.VALID_END_DATE is null ) and D.TYPE_VALUE in ('1','2') and A.IS_COLLECT = 2 and (A.STATUS = 2 or A.STATUS = 3) order by A.CREATE_TIME desc
